aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon SEC Filing Part III Information
Information regarding Amazon's Executive Officers required by Item 10 of Part III is set forth in Item 1 of Part I "Business — Information About Our Executive Officers."
Information required by Item 10 of Part III regarding Amazon's Directors is included in Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.

Information about any material changes to the process by which security holders may recommend nominees to the Board of Directors is included in Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
Information relating to Amazon's Code of Business Conduct and Ethics is set forth in Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
Information relating to Amazon's insider trading policies and procedures is set forth in Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
Information relating to compliance with Section 16(a) of the 1934 Act is set forth in Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
Amazon intends to disclose amendments to Amazon's Code of Business Conduct and Ethics on Amazon's investor relations website under the heading "Corporate Governance" at amazon.com/ir.
Amazon intends to disclose waivers of the provisions of Amazon's Code of Business Conduct and Ethics on Amazon's investor relations website under the heading "Corporate Governance" at amazon.com/ir.
Amazon's intention to disclose amendments and waivers to the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics on the investor relations website is to the extent permissible under Nasdaq rules.
Information from Amazon's Proxy Statement relating to Amazon's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders is incorporated by reference into the filing.

text:
## Part III

Information regarding our Executive Officers required by Item 10 of Part III is set forth in Item 1 of Part I “Business — Information About Our Executive Officers.” Information required by Item 10 of Part III regarding our Directors and any material changes to the process by which security holders may recommend nominees to the Board of Directors is included in our Proxy Statement relating to our 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, and is incorporated herein by reference. Information relating to our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, insider trading policies and procedures, and, to the extent applicable, compliance with Section 16(a) of the 1934 Act is set forth in our Proxy Statement relating to our 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and is incorporated herein by reference. To the extent permissible under Nasdaq rules, we intend to disclose amendments to our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, as well as waivers of the provisions thereof, on our investor relations website under the heading “Corporate Governance” at amazon.com/ir.
